ing: 4 ounces cooked corned beef, shredded or finely chopped
1 (1 ounce) package McCormickÂ® Guacamole Seasoning Mix
des: "The tradition of the New England boiled dinner Â– a one-pot dish featuring corned beef, cabbage, carrots and potatoes Â– lives on! Recreate that irresistible taste with a dip featuring simple but flavorful ingredients. Mix cream cheese and Swiss cheese with plain Greek yogurt and flavor with McCormickÂ® Guacamole Seasoning Mix. Blend with corned beef and chill until game time. Dip with carrot sticks, bread or assorted crackers."
ins:
Mix all ingredients, except parsley flakes, in a large bowl until well blended. Cover.
Refrigerate 1 hour or until ready to serve. Sprinkle with parsley.
